command.clearCache.title: Clear Cache
command.showOutput.title: Show Output
settings.cacheExpirationMinutes.descript: How many minutes of inactivity before a cached component's props are cleared. âš ï¸ Warning: Setting this too high may result in high memory usage for large projects.
settings.normaliseComment.description: Remove duplicate whitespace and newlines from JSDoc comments. Disable to preserve original formatting from source files.
settings.normaliseType.description: Remove duplicate whitespace and newlines from type definitions. Disable to preserve original formatting from source files.
settings.normaliseDefaultValue.descripti: Remove duplicate whitespace and newlines from default values. Disable to preserve original formatting from source files.
settings.tooltipOrder.description: The order in which properties are displayed in the tooltip.
settings.tooltipOrder.normal: Declaration order (as defined in the type)
settings.tooltipOrder.required: Required properties first, then optional (alphabetically within groups)
settings.tooltipOrder.type: Alphabetical by type name, then by property name
settings.tooltipFormat.description: The format used to display component properties in the tooltip.
settings.tooltipFormat.bulletList: Simple bullet list with indented comments
settings.tooltipFormat.table: Table format with columns for property, type, default, and notes
settings.detailedResolverLogging.descrip: Enable detailed logging for import path resolution. Useful for debugging path alias and component resolution issues.
